name: Rosaria
storytext: "Light creates shadow, but shadow will not be controlled by light."
source: Reward for inviting Rosaria to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Ravaging Confession
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111131]</color>. (When the $[C111131] effect is triggered, creates <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111133]</color>.)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, creates 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scope Out Soft Spots</color>. (When the Scope Out Soft Spots effect is triggered, creates <color=#FFFFFFFF>Strike Where It Hurts</color>.)
skills.description: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, creates 2 stacks of Scope Out Soft Spots. (When the Scope Out Soft Spots effect is triggered, creates Strike Where It Hurts.)

skills.name: Rites of Termination
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111131]</color>, and summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111132]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, creates 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scope Out Soft Spots</color>, and summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Evercold Frostlance</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, creates 2 stacks of Scope Out Soft Spots, and summons Evercold Frostlance.
